tasks.task: Attaching and operating a chopper head.
subtasks: Walking to the chopper head.
Checking the attachments.
Securing the chopper head to the tractor.
Adjusting the mounted chopper head.
Starting the tractor engine.
Driving the tractor to the field.
Operating the chopper head while moving the tractor.
Walking to the swather.
Checking the swather's settings.
Securing the swather to the tractor.
Starting the swather engine.
Driving the tractor to the hay field.
Using the swather to cut hay.
Walking to the hay stack and trailer.
Moving the hay from the stack to the trailer.
Stacking hay on the trailer.
Securing the hay on the trailer.

tasks.task: Delivering hay to a storage area.
subtasks: Walking to the trailer.
Detaching the trailer from the tractor.
Driving the tractor to the storage area.
Parking the tractor near the storage area.
Directing the trailer to a designated spot.
Unloading the hay from the trailer.
Walking to the combine harvester.
Checking the combine's settings.
Starting the combine engine.
Driving the combine to the crop field.
Operating the combine to harvest the crops.
Walking to the seed drill.
Checking the seed drill's settings.
Securing the seed drill to the tractor.
Starting the seed drill's engine.
Attaching seed packets to the drill.
Driving the tractor with the seed drill to the field.
Planting seeds using the seed drill.

tasks.task: Attaching and operating a fertilizer spreader.
subtasks: Walking to the fertilizer spreader.
Checking the spreader's settings.
Securing the spreader to the tractor.
Starting the spreader's engine.
Attaching fertilizer bags to the spreader.
Driving the tractor with the spreader to the field.
Spraying or spreading fertilizer over the field.

tasks.task: Attaching and using a bale net.
subtasks: Walking to the bale net.
Checking the bale net's functionality.
Securing the bale net to the tractor.
Starting the bale net's engine.
Driving the tractor with the bale net to the hay field.
Using the bale net to form hay bales.

tasks.task: Weighing hay bales with a scale.
subtasks: Walking to the bale scale.
Preparing the scale to measure bales.
Loading a bale onto the scale.
Recording the weight of the bale.
